There are no Megs troops in the base. The soldier everyone is talking 
about is the new bot that landed on the planet.

::Killfest::

Killfest nods, exiting the bridge and heading off for the engine room.

"Ship's fine, DrillBit," he hears Darkmouse's voice on his comm as he 
walks.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "you can go if you want, StarScream. I don't think one soldier will 
be a
> problem though. He then heard the message from the spider. he walked
> away so no one could hear.
> "Phibia, Megatron and his troops have already reached their base. 
There
> is one troop. We can handle him."
> He walks back, and opens a link.
> "Dark Mouse, scan the ship for any serious damage."
> He looks in the Bridge.
> "Nothing wrong but a few broken doors. Lets go check the Engine
